mapper.insert: insert into lq_account_seq( member_id, direction, transaction_order_id, transaction_type_id, transaction_amount, payment_id, payment_platform_order_id, pre_balance, balance, created_time, remarks, cash_poundage, task_id )values( #{memberId}, #{direction}, #{transactionOrderId}, #{transactionTypeId}, #{transactionAmount}, #{paymentId}, #{paymentPlatformOrderId}, #{preBalance}, #{balance}, #{createdTime}, #{remarks}, #{cashPoundage}, #{taskId} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from lq_account_seq t where member_id=#{memberId} and task_id=#{taskId} and transaction_type_id=#{type}
select count(*) from lq_account_seq t where member_id=#{memberId} and task_id=#{taskId} and transaction_type_id=#{type} and DATE_FORMAT(created_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{date}
select * from lq_account_seq where member_id=#{memberId} order by created_time desc limit #{start},#{end}
